ability.name: Better Not Tell You Now
ability.description: * When the High Priestess is placed on Better Not Tell You Now, you may also: * Take 1 Corruption Point * All Adversaries play their Intents face up, even if they would normally be hidden. * When an Adversary draws an Intent, instead they draw two: the High Priestess chooses which one they keep. * When the High Priestess is discarded from Better Not Tell You Now, deal 3 additional Magic Ranged Damage to every Adversary.
